html:
8.6.20  12:44 am   Hey Bill, would you ever make vlogs or nah?

      i've been doing it for years, but i usually do the editing several years later so i know which things it would make sense to include

8.6.20  12:34 am   what song of yours do you think best represent "the mission" trope?

      call me old fashioned but i still drink beans from the can

8.6.20  12:29 am   Do any of your songs hold any personal significance to you?

     yes

     If so, which songs?

     all of them

8.6.20  12:29 am   I started to learn a bit of All Star on my trumpet, but haven't tried in a bit because I'm lazy. Give me motivation :)

      do you want to do it or not

8.6.20  12:27 am   is it okay to abandon long-term projects, or at least put them on pause indefinitely in order to start a new project?

      not really but sometimes what choice do you have

8.6.20  12:27 am   how long does your YouTube vedoes normally take

      about 3 minutes on average

8.6.20  12:23 am   i think my world is about to end. what do you do if you think your world is about to end

      start a rigorous production+publication schedule

8.6.20  12:14 am   what is Clarity?

      clearness

8.6.20  12:13 am   What do you do to avoid boredom while you're in quarantine? 

      BOREDOM IS EFFORTLESSLY KEPT AT BAY WHEN YOU ARE CRIPPLED BY THE WEIGHT OF YOUR OWN AGENDA

8.6.20  12:11 am   are you gonna make more songs :p

     OH HELL YEAH

     they are g r e a t

8.6.20  12:05 am   are you going to release new music soon

      OH HELL YEAH

8.5.20  11:59 pm   What's your favorite time on the clock?

      0:00

8.5.20  11:53 pm   do you answer more dumb questions than serious questions?

      can you explain to me the difference

8.5.20  11:38 pm   What's the ideal way to not do anything?

      no way

8.5.20  11:32 pm   when do i leave my house?

      to find other houses for your house to be friends with

8.5.20  11:28 pm   how far along are you in your project?

      right at the cliff's edge

8.5.20  11:21 pm   How do I summon demons? I drew a pentagram on the floor and lit some candles but demons never show up.

      that's because it's already there. you're the demon

8.5.20  11:14 pm   Do you have any advice on how to not make a melody sound forced ?

      force it, then let go of it, and let it bounce around off all the walls, as a result of the force you initially gave it which has now been taken over by the physics of momentum

8.5.20  11:08 pm   Which superpower is the fastest?

      speed

8.5.20  11:05 pm   Is it possible to think about nothing at all?

      no

8.5.20  11:00 pm   How can I create a musical resolution while not making the resolution sound like the end of a section?

      can you think of any example of when anyone has ever done this

8.5.20  10:52 pm   Whats the hardest part of being a musician?

      getting all the weird brain politics out of the way

8.5.20  10:48 pm   how long will the next video be?

      probably between 30 seconds and 3 minutes

8.5.20  10:39 pm   How are you so epic

      i just do it the normal way

8.5.20  10:02 pm   hi bill. i spend all my time learning instruments and lots of software and stuff, and i think im making a ton of progress, but my ability to actually come up with ideas for my own music is severely lacking when im not in front of my computer. im starting to not like writing things while i record, but when i try and write without all those things i am petrified

      maybe you could have like a petrification theme song

8.5.20  9:29 pm   how long does it take you to edit a single music video?

      we'll see

8.5.20  9:10 pm   What are you working today

      songwriting

8.5.20  8:54 pm   I heard that you're working on a new video. Is that true?

      almost

8.5.20  8:52 pm   Do you think a revolving door refrigerator is a good idea?

     almost

     Should i patent it?

     yes

8.5.20  8:38 pm   How is it that you are so amazing? Like, I don't understand. Do you use flex tape or something?

      i don't use flex tape but i am inspired by it

8.5.20  8:22 pm   Does the day go on? Go on? Go on?

      dunno, that sounds like some sort of ponzi scheme to me

8.5.20  7:56 pm   do you have a good recipe for macaroni and cheese?

      no

8.5.20  7:33 pm   How do you drink water?

      the easy way

8.5.20  7:15 pm   What was your inspiration to write "Stuck in a rut"? (please be specific, if you were stuck in a rut, what was the rut?)

      couldn't write a song despite feeling way overqualified to, by that point

8.5.20  7:14 pm   Can Bob Really Build?????

      no, but surely you can

8.5.20  6:53 pm   What is your favorite chord progression?

      regular

8.5.20  6:49 pm   i feel like at some point you broke the world down into its individual building blocks and now your career is just playing around with them, does that sound close to true?

      that sounds lovely but i don't think i have gotten quite to that level yet. although sometimes it seems like i am playing someone who has, in a musical. so i have that going for me

8.5.20  6:31 pm   Everyone asks where is bill, but nobody asks how is bill.

     that's not true, that's like most people's first question

     So, how are you today?

      ok

8.5.20  6:03 pm   Can you tell me the difference between paradox and irony?

      this may not be what you want to hear, but both of those things are already different from themselves

8.5.20  5:43 pm   What should i do?

      everything. there is time

8.5.20  5:40 pm   How can I write a song that really sucks and then duck?

      seems pretty straightforward

8.5.20  5:35 pm   Why is past both a word that can be used for before and after?

      i'm reminded of a line from the TV show "taxi", where Christopher Lloyd's character is offered a seasick pill, to which he replies "no thanks, i'm already a little seasick." it was in that moment that i realized exactly why and how it is so easy and natural for things to mean their opposite

8.5.20  5:28 pm   In your video "how to win at spelling", did you decide to include a dog pilot after figuring out that "the complete good spelling kit" was an anagram for "dog pilot gets pickle on helmet", or did you include the dog pilot first and then tried to find an anagram to go with it?

      'complete good spelling kit' was first. had no idea what would be in there

8.5.20  5:13 pm   What is your favorite question that you have been asked? What is your least favorite question you have been asked?

      this one

8.5.20  5:09 pm   what is your opinion on bagels?

      too hard to be comfortable. too soft to be powerful

8.5.20  5:05 pm   "Richard Nixon was the first emo president." how do you feel about this proposal

      proposals are usually about the future not the past, but i think he might have been the most anti-emo president of all time

8.5.20  4:52 pm   when is a good time to invent the world?

      as soon as possible

8.5.20  4:43 pm   how do cars fly

      by being planes

8.5.20  3:41 pm   How are you so creative?

      i dropped myself on my head when i was young

8.5.20  3:29 pm   it's been a year how many songs do you have in store for us like woah

      hundreds, but that has nothing to do with a year, i was attempting to work on graphics techniques, which ultimately failed (maybe) so i guess it's song time
